content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x3)
- Inserter (position y) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position z) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position x3

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
